programme.title: World Rookie Tour - SNB Slopestyle - worldwide
programme.desc: Winter is back again and with it the legendary World Rookie Tour. This year, the World Rookie Tour began searching for talent to include freeskiers. First-class action from the best parks in the world is guaranteed.

programme.title: Cape Pioneer Trek 2019 - Südafrika
programme.desc: The Cape Pioneer Trek is one of the highlights in the international mountain bike calendar. It is one of the most anticipated mountain bike races of the year, with over 250 teams of two taking part in what is now a seven-day stage race.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Elena Moreno
programme.desc: Cape Verde is hosting the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the best kitesurfers in the world like Elena Moreno. From breathtaking freestyle tricks to impressive racing moments, her determination and talent are on display.

programme.title: LAAX Freestyle - Snowboard Halfpipe Special
programme.desc: The LAAX Open brings together the best professionals in the world with the next generation of riders - all competing in the same event. First-class snowboard competitions, powder runs, lifestyle, cultural and culinary delights - there is something for every taste.

programme.title: Athlete Profile - Aurelien Routens
programme.desc: Aurelien Routens from France was vice world champion at the Freeride World Tour 2013 and has made a name for himself with his outstanding web series "Carpe Diem". In our 26-minute portrait, the 36-year-old talks about his life as a snowboard professional.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile Dani Arnold - The Art of Iceclimbing
programme.desc: Daniel Arnold was born in 1984 in the Swiss canton of Uri and grew up in the small mountain village of Biel in the heart of the Swiss Alps. Dani and his brother experience all aspects of mountain life: hiking, skiing and climbing in some of the toughest climbing locations in the world

programme.title: Episode 40
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 40

programme.title: Less
programme.desc: Der 15. jährliche Ski-Film von Level 1. Mit dabei: Magnus Granér. LSM. Will Berman. Duncan Adams. Sig Tveit. Adam Delorme. Tim McChesney. Wiley Miller. Khai Krepela. Will Wesson. Sandy Boville. Shay Lee. Tanner Rainville. LJ Strenio. Banks Gilberti. Logan Imlach.

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 4
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Fuwairit (QAT)
programme.desc: Fuwairit Beach is the venue for the Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best freestyle kiteboarders put their skills to the test. With constant wind, this hotspot in Qatar offers the perfect conditions for the competitions.

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: The Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 will take place in Jericoacoara, where the world's best wingfoilers will compete against each other. With its legendary winds, this Brazilian jewel offers ideal conditions for high-speed racing.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #1 - Baqueira Beret (ESP)
programme.desc: The 2023 Freeride World Tour kicks off in January in its 16th season – as usual with the best freeriders all over the globe! The first stop of the tour takes place in Baqueira Beret.

programme.title: Winter Games 2019 - Ski & SNB Halfpipe Cardrona (NZL)
programme.desc: This is the seventh edition of the Winter Games New Zealand, taking place in Queenstown, Wanaka and Naseby in August and September 2019. The Winter Games NZ is one of the top 5 winter sports events in the world with 26 events at 6 venues over 17 days.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: FAI World Drone Racing Championship Grand Final - Ningbo (CHN)
programme.desc: The elite of drone racing take on the challenge on the 630m race track with 14 different types of obstacles and 25 flags to qualify for the finals and secure a share of the total prize money of $125,000.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: Swatch Catch The Moment - Profile Kassia Meador
programme.desc: "Catch the Moment" profiles athletes from around the world, including American longboard surfer Kassia Meador. Kassia is constantly exploring new creative endeavors and travels the world for surfing and photography trips.

programme.title: Profile Freeskier Nadine Wallner
programme.desc: Nadine Wallner is a freeskier, climber and mountaineer who has experienced incredible highs and devastating lows on her journey of discovery. She takes part in the Freeride World Tour, the pinnacle of freeriding competition for skiers and snowboarders.

programme.title: Swatch Timeline - This Is My Winter
programme.desc: Experience the mountain with the myth-Xavier De Le Rue. There are so many moments so many adventures so many ways of seeing the mountains. You only need a few magic days to film a part for a snowboard film. But this season it took me six months - so: This is my winter.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2023 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min LIVEmaniacs Summary
programme.desc: In this year’s anniversary edition, competitors from 55+ nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP), Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: WOF 2023 #36: SPAR Swiss Epic 2023
programme.desc: Vom 15. bis 19. August kämpfen Zweierteams im malerischen Graubünden um den Gesamtsieg und wichtige UCI-Mountainbike-Punkte beim Swiss Epic. Mit mehr als 350km und fast 12.000 Höhenmetern wird den besten Mountainbikern alles abverlangt.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #37: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Sand Series Saarlouis Classic (GER)
programme.desc: Die Sand Series kehrt noch in diesem Monat an den Ort zurück, an dem alles begann: nach Saarlouis, wo die Serie 2021 erstmals stattfand. Der ehemalige Weltranglistenerste Michele Cappelletti wird zum ersten Mal mit André Baran antreten.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #38: WES E-Bike World Series Round #3 & #4
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode reisen wir nach Italien und Belgien zu Runde 3 und 4 der World E-Bike Series. Die weltbesten Mountainbikerinnen und Mountainbiker werden darum kämpfen, wer in der Mitte des Rennkalenders die Führung übernimmt.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #39: FIA Karting European Championships
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode besuchen wir die zukünftigen Formular 1 Stars bei der FIA Karting Europameisterschaft 2023 in Cremona, Italien. Schnallen Sie sich an und starten Sie Ihre Motoren, denn wir werden gleich auf Platz 1 fahren.

programme.title: Profile Freeskier Nadine Wallner
programme.desc: Nadine Wallner is a freeskier, climber and mountaineer who has experienced incredible highs and devastating lows on her journey of discovery. She takes part in the Freeride World Tour, the pinnacle of freeriding competition for skiers and snowboarders.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: WOF 2025 #21: IWSA World Cup & My own way - Lindsey Hamm
programme.desc: In the first part, we follow the exciting action of the IWSA Wingfoil World Cup in Morocco. In the second part, the focus is on the American climber Lindsey Hamm, who presents an intimate portrait of her life.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #22: Swatch Nines – Skate & Surf
programme.desc: The show offers an exciting insight into the first Swatch Nines event, which took place in October 2024 in Waco Surf, Texas. The three-day event emphasized creativity and collaboration over rankings and scores.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #23: Motosurf Grand Prix
programme.desc: The 2025 UIM MotoSurf World Championship-Fujairah Grand Prix took place from April 11-13 at Fujairah Corniche in the United Arab Emirates. This event marked the opening round of the 2025 MotoSurf season and attracted 80 riders from 18 countries

programme.title: WOF 2025 #24: Formula Wing European Championships 2025
programme.desc: Formula Wing European Championships: This year's event brought together the fastest and most experienced wingfoil riders from across Europe to battle it out for victory on the stunning waters of Urla in Turkey.

programme.title: Episode 40
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 40

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #1 - Baqueira Beret (ESP)
programme.desc: The 2023 Freeride World Tour kicks off in January in its 16th season – as usual with the best freeriders all over the globe! The first stop of the tour takes place in Baqueira Beret.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #19: Pasko the Magic Move
programme.desc: Recovering from testicular cancer, professional athlete and filmmaker Maarten Molenaar embarks on a journey to Fuerteventura to learn a new freestyle windsurfing trick - the Pasko.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #13: GKA & GWA - Best Of World Cup Cape Verde
programme.desc: Cape Verde is blessed with a moderate climate, north-easterly trade winds and warm ocean swells that break on the islands' reefs, making it a paradise for Kite-Surfing and wingfoiling. Sal island in particular boasts one of the world's greatest right-hand point-breaks.

programme.title: Keep On Keeping On
programme.desc: Keep On Keeping On - Dreaming of Rampage portraits Johny Salidos career and his long way to compete at the Rampage - the holy grail of freeride mountainbiking.

programme.title: Marathon Internationale de Gorges de l´Ardéche & SaintéLyon (FRA)
programme.desc: The Ardèche Gorges International Marathon is back, bringing together thousands of participants in this breathtaking setting. AND trail running The Saintelyon has developed into a real institution: 17,000 participants take part

programme.title: Expedition Antarctica - Caro North - Antarctic
programme.desc: Ice climbing, ski mountaineering and days of sailing on open waters through the infamous Drake Passage: 28-year-old extreme athlete Caro North set off for a four-week expedition to the far south of our continent.

programme.title: LAAX OPEN 2020 (SUI)
programme.desc: The 5th edition of the LAAX OPEN is taking place from January 13 to 18, 2020. It is the snowboarding event highlight in Europe’s mountains and guarantees snowboarding at its finest.

programme.title: Mammut Project 360 Grad
programme.desc: "Project360" takes digital mapping into the third dimension and makes the legendary Eiger North Face a virtual experience. A view through the eyes of the climber, directly from the wall. The impressive 360° panorama of the walls: www.project360.mammut.ch

programme.title: Roopkund - Mountainbike Expedition to the Indian Himalaya
programme.desc: Hans Rey, Richie Schley and Joscha Forstreuter travelled to the Indian Himalayas to the mysterious Roopkund Lake, which is known for having hundreds of ancient human skeletons lying dormant at its bottom. This is followed by a descent of 3,500 metres in altitude.

programme.title: Searching for the Rivergod II
programme.desc: The documentary "Searching for the River God - The Journey continues" shows in fantastic images extreme kayaking on the most attractive and remote rivers in the world in Siberia, the jungles of Mexico and in Iceland.

programme.title: adidas Sickline - Extreme Kayak World Championship - The Documentary
programme.desc: This is the documentary about the history of the famous "Wellerbrücke" rapids, a famous section of the glacier-fed Ötztaler Ache river in Tyrol, and the adidas Sickline Extreme Kayak World Championship.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Airton Cozzolino
programme.desc: We joined Airton Cozzolino, the 2023 World Champion, at his home in Cape Verde to see what goes on behind the life of a champion, and what the pressure of starting the first competition of the year at home truly feels like.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #2 - Ordino Arcalís Pro (AND)
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2023 has its second stop in Ordino Arcalís Pro, Andorra - as always with the best freeriders from around the world! Thus, the FWT returns to the freeride Mecca of the Pyrenees.

programme.title: Snow Bike Festival Gstaad (SUI) & Tom Evans Documentary - worldwide
programme.desc: Snow Bike Festival 2020: Mountain biking on snow - a demanding combination AND trail running profile Tom Evans, an absolute ultra trail running newbie, wants to become the best endurance athlete on the trails.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - Stop 1 - Hakuba (JPN)
programme.desc: The best freeriders in the world are taking part in the Freeride World Tour 2020 in Hakuba, Japan. The FWT20 Hakuba, the first of the five-stop tour, is only the second time the event has taken place in the Japanese Alps.

programme.title: Racing Unleashed - Cham (SUI) & World Rowing Indoor Championship - Paris (FRA)
programme.desc: In Racing Unleashed, a virtual racing game makes players sweat as they compete for a prize of CHF 30,000.00 for the winner AND The 2020 World Indoor Rowing Championships is in its third year, attracting athletes from a record number of 51 countries.

programme.title: Outdoorsports Team - The Fascination of ski Mountaineering
programme.desc: The film “Fascination of Ski Mountaineering” shows four top Austrian athletes doing high-alpine ski mountaineering from the Mittelbergjoch over the Taschach Glacier to the Wildspitze.

programme.title: Canyoning 2008
programme.desc: Canyoning is one of the most exciting outdoor sports and for many it is a true decathlon of extreme activities. Physical fitness, team spirit and trust are of the utmost importance.

programme.title: adidas Outdoorsports Team 2012: Canyoning - Unicycling - Slacklining
programme.desc: Modern outdoor sport has many facets. Today we follow the Outdoor Sports Team for venturesome jumps, fast downhills and balancing acts in dizzy heights. We start in Ticino.

programme.title: The Barrel - Part I
programme.desc: "The Barrel" is a cinematic tribute to moments in big waves. This program takes a journey to some legendary barrel destinations - Hawaii's Pipeline, Indonesia and Kirra on Australia's Gold Coast.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - BMX Final
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: WOF 2023 #40: BetCity Royal Championships Queen & King of the Court 2023
programme.desc: Dieses Turnier ist größer als je zuvor, die besten Spieler der Welt kommen vom 5. bis 10. September nach 'Manhattan an der Maas'. Ein 'königliches' Stadion direkt im Stadtzentrum am Henegouwerplein ist der Schauplatz und Nebenplätze in den Vororten umrahmen dieses Ereignis.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #41: Vanora ENGADINWIND by Dakine 2023
programme.desc: Der VANORA ENGADINWIND by Dakine kehrt 2023 mit viel spannender Windsurf-Action auf dem Silvaplanasee in der Schweiz zurück. Der ENGADINWIND ist auch Gastgeber der ersten iQ FOiL U21 Weltmeisterschaft, die für das olympische Programm in Paris 2024 ausgewählt wurde.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #42: WES E-Bike World Series #5 & World Rookie Tour Finals
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode machen wir einen Städtetrip: Zuerst schauen wir bei der WES E-Bike World Series in Bielstein, Deutschland, vorbei und dann geht's weiter zum Finale der World Rookie Tour und ihren jungen Skatetalente in Innbruck.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #43: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour The Stars of Freestyle
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge werden wir die GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023 besuchen. Die Hälfte der Kitesurfing-Freestyle-Saison ist bereits vorbei und das ist ein guter Grund, die vergangenen Events und den aktuellen Stand der Athleten zu analysieren.

programme.desc: It was the 3rd stop of the Freeride World Tour 2023 in Canada at Kicking Horse Golden BC Pro, (CAN). After two stops in the Pyrenees the world’s best riders came over the Atlantic to hit the powder in the Rocky Mountains.

programme.desc: The fourth and penultimate stop of the Freeride World Tour 2020 is just a few days away. Since many drivers want to make it to the finals in Verbier and the FWT 2021, they will give their best in Fieberbrunn from March 7th to 13th.

programme.title: Engadinsnow - Silvaplana (SUI)
programme.desc: ENGADINSNOW is one of the oldest freeride competitions in the Alps. It is the world's only parallel freeride event. Teams of two ride the Corvatsch north face at the same time and compete with other teams.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Best Of Season 2020 - Worldwide
programme.desc: The first stop of this year's Freeride World Tour was in Hakuba, Japan. Next the tour went to Kicking Horse in British Columbia. The third stop took the riders to Ordino Arcalis in the Pyrenees. The last stop was Fieberbrunn in Austria.

programme.title: Bike2Boat
programme.desc: In the Bike 2 Boat adventurewe set off on a climate-neutral journey through the Alps together with four kayakers. We will accompany them on their search for extraordinary kayak spots and unforgettable experiences.

programme.title: A Song for Tomorrow
programme.desc: This April, Mayan Smith-Gobat and Ben Rueck joined China's renowned mountaineers Liu Yongbang (Abond) and Xiao Ting on an expedition to explore the Qingfeng Valley on the border of Zhangjiajie, China's first and largest national park.

programme.title: Extremsportveko "The Beauty of Outdoor Sports"
programme.desc: Today, we travel all the way up to Voss, the adventure Capital of Norway, where the “Extremesportsveko” takes place once a year. During this week, national and international athletes compete and challenge themselves in their elements.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #25: Profile – Jakob Schubert & Highline Wendestein
programme.desc: Today we dive into the world of alpine sports. In the first part of the show, we look at the greatest achievements of the austian climber Jakob Schubert. Afterwards we turn to a high-wire act by highliner Lukas Irmler, who faces a special challenge in his home mountains

programme.title: 2025 WES UCI E-MTB XC World Cup Cheile Grădiștei Round

programme.title: WOF 2024 #11: Mediterranean Epic 2024

programme.title: WOF 2025 #29: World Downhill Skateboarding Championships - Axamer, Lizum (AUT)

programme.desc: Queen & King of the Court is coming to Utrecht again this year! This time for a Summer Edition.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #31: DATEV Challenge Roth 2025

programme.title: WOF 2025 #32: Epic Series - Andorra Epic
programme.desc: The Andorra Epic took place from July 15 to 18, 2025, in the breathtaking Pyrenees. Over four days, riders covered 160 km and 5,000 meters of elevation gain. The event offered world-class mountain biking in the unique atmosphere of Andorra's alpine villages.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #50: Profile Marko Grilc
programme.desc: Diese Folge widmen wir dem legendären Snowboarder Marko Grilc. Sei dabei, wenn wir das Leben und die Leistungen dieser Ikone der Snowboardwelt feiern. Macht euch bereit für eine herzliche Reise durch das bemerkenswerte Vermächtnis von Marko Grilc.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 1, Martinique
programme.desc: The Strongman Champions League kicks off its 2014 season in Martinique.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 2, Germany FIBO Power
programme.desc: The second stage of 2014 Strongman champions League, in Cologne, Germany. 14 athletes from 12 different countries battled through six events on the second stop

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 3, Serbia
programme.desc: The third episode is hosted in Serbia where world records are broken!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: The fourth episode takes place in Finland with events such as Bus Pull and the forward hold

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 5, Holland
programme.desc: The next stage of the SCL takes place in Holland with events such as the Atlas Stones and Truck Pull being witnessed

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: The SCL is in full swing and the sixth stage takes place in Latvia where the men are eager to break a national record held here

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 7, Portugal
programme.desc: The competition continues in Portugal with 6 events and thousands of spectators

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 8, Croatia
programme.desc: Episode 8 takes place in 36 degree heat in Croatia and sees the return of Krzysztof Radzikowski after a 2 month absence due to injury

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 9, Poland
programme.desc: SCL returns to Poland with 12 athletes all battling for the number one title

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 10, Hungary
programme.desc: The 10th stage takes place in Hungary and features new super talent!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 11, Zambia
programme.desc: The first ever SCL in Zambia! The athletes get to take in some of the stunning sights and go on to do events such as Tyre Flip and Log Lift

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 12, Romania
programme.desc: The competition moves to Romania and for the first time this season the athletes compete in rainy conditions which make the events even tougher

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 13, Lithunia
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition takes place in Lithunia and world records are once again broken!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 14, Estonia
programme.desc: Episode 14 takes place in Estonia where drama and world records will be seen again

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.desc: The top 8 Heavyweight kickboxers in the world compete in a 1 day tournament to see who will be crowned World Grand Prix Champion.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 85 will feature the four-man heavyweight tournament featuring two-time tournament finalist Jahfarr Wilnis (33-13-1, 8 KO), Heavyweight newcomer Murat Aygun (33-3-0), Nigerian giant Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (22-2-1), and ‘The Iron Bull’ Enver Sljivar (40-6, 23 KO). A kickboxing legend will also make his return on April 29 as former two-time GLORY champion Murthel Groenhart (69-25-3, 40 KO) challenges current welterweight champion Endy Semeleer (33-1, 17 KO) for the title.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: In the main event, featherweight champ Petch (168-39-3, 27 KO) looks to defend his crown for the sixth time when he welcomes the challenge of local hero Ahmad Chikh Mousa (58-8-1, 28 KO). The co-main event will see a crucial fight between Romania’s Benjamin Adegbuyi (35-8, 20 KO) and Sofian Laïdouni (35-2-1, 17 KO) of France that will decide who will qualify for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix in December.

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E101 K1 WGP 2010 Tokyo - Finals
programme.desc: The top 8 Heavyweight kickboxers in the world compete in a 1 day tournament to see who will be crowned World Grand Prix Champion.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 85 will feature the four-man heavyweight tournament featuring two-time tournament finalist Jahfarr Wilnis (33-13-1, 8 KO), Heavyweight newcomer Murat Aygun (33-3-0), Nigerian giant Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (22-2-1), and ‘The Iron Bull’ Enver Sljivar (40-6, 23 KO). A kickboxing legend will also make his return on April 29 as former two-time GLORY champion Murthel Groenhart (69-25-3, 40 KO) challenges current welterweight champion Endy Semeleer (33-1, 17 KO) for the title.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: In the main event, featherweight champ Petch (168-39-3, 27 KO) looks to defend his crown for the sixth time when he welcomes the challenge of local hero Ahmad Chikh Mousa (58-8-1, 28 KO). The co-main event will see a crucial fight between Romania’s Benjamin Adegbuyi (35-8, 20 KO) and Sofian Laïdouni (35-2-1, 17 KO) of France that will decide who will qualify for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix in December.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The interim-GLORY Heavyweight Title will be up for grabs as top ranked heavyweight contender Antonio Plazibat (22-4, 16 KO) collides with the number two ranked Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (24-2-1, 12 KO) in the main event. These teammates will have to put their friendship aside for one night and go head-to-head for GLORY gold. Also on the card are title fights in the Middleweight, Welterweight and Light Heavyweight divisions.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A four-man one-night heavyweight tournament will take centre stage with the winner punching his ticket into the historic end of year GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix for a chance to win a life-changing $500,000. The four participants are Dutch giant Martin Terpstra (21-5, 11 KO), former light heavyweight title contender Mohamed Amine (29-5, 16 KO), the explosive Bahram Rajabzadeh (62-1, 56 KO), and the bruising power puncher Uku Jürjendal (18-7, 14 KO). A huge international title fight will feature in the co-main event as Tyjani Beztati (24-4, 9 KO) will put his GLORY lightweight championship on the line against Japanese star Kaito Ono (51-6-1, 22 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A huge title fight rematch will take place in the main event as rivals Tiffany ‘Time Bomb’ van Soest (24-6-2, 9 KO) and Sarah Moussaddak (8-3, 1 KO) lock horns once again. The rest of the card is stacked with some exciting names and thrilling fights. French Algerian Nordine Mahieddine (27-15, 12 KO) collides with France’s Abderahmane Coulibaly (58-20-1, 25 KO) in a big heavyweight contest, Germany’s Denis Wosik (37-8-1, 9 KO) meets the super popular Albanian Berjan Peposhi (27-3, 16 KO), former GLORY title challenger Karim Ghajji (103-17-1, 53 KO) returns and squares-off against Serbia’s Nikola Todorovic (26-3, 14 KO), and Iliass Hammouche (32-6, 7 KO) will finally make his much...

programme.desc: The interim-GLORY Heavyweight Title will be up for grabs as top ranked heavyweight contender Antonio Plazibat (22-4, 16 KO) collides with the number two ranked Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (24-2-1, 12 KO) in the main event. These teammates will have to put their friendship aside for one night and go head-to-head for GLORY gold. programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Former Light Heavyweight Champion Tarik Khbabez (52-12-1, 22 KO) and Bahram Rajabzabeh (72-5, 63 KO) collide in a huge showdown for the vacant Light Heavyweight title. The penultimate round of the Last Heavyweight Standing tournament resumes with eight heavyweights competing in two separate four-man one-night tournaments. Notable participants include Levi Rigters (20-3, 10 KO), Nabil Khachab (30-6-1, 4 KO), Rade Opacic (22-7, 17 KO) and Milos Cvjeticanin (14-4, 9 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Former Light Heavyweight Champion Tarik Khbabez (52-12-1, 22 KO) and Bahram Rajabzabeh (72-5, 63 KO) collide in a huge showdown for the vacant Light Heavyweight title. The penultimate round of the Last Heavyweight Standing tournament resumes with eight heavyweights competing in two separate four-man one-night tournaments. Notable participants include Levi Rigters (20-3, 10 KO), Nabil Khachab (30-6-1, 4 KO), Rade Opacic (22-7, 17 KO) and Milos Cvjeticanin (14-4, 9 KO).

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E294 This is Fate S1 E294
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E294 Undercover Love S1 E294
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E48 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E48
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E294 King of Hearts S1 E294
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E294 Second Chances S1 E294
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E88 Jodha Akbar S3 E88
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E294 Second Chances S1 E294
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E88 Jodha Akbar S3 E88
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E294 This is Fate S1 E294
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Behan Hogi Teri
programme.desc: In the city of Lucknow, Gattu, a jobless UPSC aspirant falls in love with Binny, a girl who lives in his neighbourhood but doesn't pay much attention to him because she finds him a coward. Gattu's desire to marry Binny puts him in a situation where he has to not just face off with a family of criminals who want to make Binny their daughter-in-law but also gather the courage to convince his parents and neighbours that all boys and girls living in the same neighbourhood are not brothers and sisters.

programme.sub-title: S2025 : E14 The Dome at America's Center - St. Louis, MO
programme.desc: Monster Jam visits St. Louis with all the racing, skills, and freestyle action - featuring Sparkle Smash!

programme.title: Best of Monster Jam
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E13 Best Of Sparkle Smash
programme.desc: What better way to celebrate Unicorn Day than with Monster Jam's very own Sparkle Smash?! Check out Sparkle Smash and the best 2024 and 2025 freestyles, two-wheel skills, sky wheelies, races, and donuts from our favorite unicorn on wheels.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E09 LIVE: Monster Jam from Glendale, Arizona - 10/25/2025
programme.desc: Tune in LIVE as Monster Jam Fall Stadium Series rolls into Glendale, Arizona - 10/25/2025

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: Kang San is anxious because he does not know Lee Chang's intention in calling Dan Oh to the palace.

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: Yook Ho, who finds out Kang San's identity, tells Kang San to leave the Summer Palace.

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: Jeong Yoo Ha meets the queen, Lee Seol. Kang San learns that he has a brother who leads the Mok In Hoe.

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: Kang San tells Jeong Yoo Ha to reveal all the facts. Hwa Ryeong is shocked to know that Kang San is Lee Seol.

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: The uncomfortable cohabitation of Kang San, Jeong Yoo Ha, and Kim Shi Yeol continues.

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: The queen prepares the announcement of Lee Chang's dethronement, and Kang San gives Dan Oh a ring.

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: The Chief Administrator, who takes Dan Oh and Hong Joo hostage, summons scholars to the bamboo forest.

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: Kang San takes Dan Oh and the Summer Palace family to a hideout, but is worried about Jeong Yoo Ha.

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: Dan Oh, Kang San, and Kim Shi Yeol enter the palace and rescue Jeong Yoo Ha.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In finds out that his grandfather revised his will and the inheritance condition is to marry Da Hyeon.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon can't trust Jae In, and she is not interested in marriage. So, he makes a new suggestion to her.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In and Da Hyeon sign a contract to date for six months. But they are so different to date each other.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon finds out Jae In's colorful history of dating and she got angry as she remembers the kiss with him.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon heard Jae In said Da Hyeon is not special. Da Hyeon, who got hurt in pride, prepares to revenge.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: An urgent matter comes up to Jae In and Da Hyeon waits for him. They missed each other as their paths crossed.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: On Jae In's birthday, Da Hyeon prepares a special gift. Meanwhile, a man approaches Da Hyeon.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon's house was robbed. Jae In is anxious to leave her alone, he brings her to his house.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon attend Jae In's event and she meets Ju Hee, who was almost engaged with Jae In.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In had a scandal with Ju Hee while the termination date of his contract with Da Hyeon is getting closer.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon has decided to attend the group’s anniversary event to meet Jae In’s grandfather.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Ju Hee is jealous at Jae In's love for Da Hyeon. She plans to separate Da Hyeon from Jae In.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Ju Hee visits Da Hyeon and apologizes for the kidnapping, but Da Hyeon still suffers from the after-effects.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In, who suddenly took over the company, naturally moved away from Da Hyeon, and they miss each other.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
